verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Just as I am
You welcome me
With open arms
How can this be
My guilt is undone
My past is untethered
I leave it behind
And run to my Father

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There is no disappointment in your eyes
There is no shame there is only pride
I am loved
Father, I am loved by you

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So unreserved
Your heart for me
My fear is gone
I am set free
There is nothing to hide
There is nothing to measure
'Cause I am your child
And thats all that matters

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
There is no disappointment in your eyes
There is no shame there is only pride
I am loved
Father, I am loved by you
There is no distance in your embrace
Over and over again you say
I am loved
Father, I am loved by you
I am loved
Father I am loved by you

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
You are changing everything
You are changing everything
I believe it
I believe it

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
I am loved, I am loved, I am loved,
I am loved by you
